019package org.jgrapes.mail;
020
021import java.util.HashSet;
022import java.util.Optional;
023import java.util.Set;
024import java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService;
025import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
026import org.jgrapes.core.EventPipeline;
027import org.jgrapes.core.Manager;
028import org.jgrapes.core.Subchannel.DefaultSubchannel;
029import org.jgrapes.mail.events.OpenMailConnection;
030
031/**
032 * Provides a base class for mail components using connections.
033 */
034public abstract class MailConnectionManager<
035        C extends MailStoreMonitor.AbstractMailChannel>
036        extends MailComponent {
037
038    protected final Set<C> channels = new HashSet<>();
039    private ExecutorService executorService;
040
041    /**
042     * Creates a new server using the given channel.
043     * 
044     * @param componentChannel the component's channel
045     */
046    public MailConnectionManager(Channel componentChannel) {
047        super(componentChannel);
048    }
049
050    /**
051     * Sets an executor service to be used by the event pipelines
052     * that process the data from the network. Setting this
053     * to an executor service with a limited number of threads
054     * allows to control the maximum load from the network.
055     * 
056     * @param executorService the executorService to set
057     * @return the TCP connection manager for easy chaining
058     * @see Manager#newEventPipeline(ExecutorService)
059     */
060    public MailConnectionManager<C>
061            setExecutorService(ExecutorService executorService) {
062        this.executorService = executorService;
063        return this;
064    }
065
066    /**
067     * Returns the executor service.
068     *
069     * @return the executorService
070     */
071    public ExecutorService executorService() {
072        return executorService;
073    }
074
075    /**
076     * A sub-channel for mail connections.
077     */
078    protected abstract class AbstractMailChannel extends DefaultSubchannel
079            implements MailChannel {
080
081        private final EventPipeline downPipeline;
082        private final OpenMailConnection openEvent;
083
084        /**
085         * Instantiates a new mail channel instance.
086         *
087         * @param event the main channel
088         */
089        public AbstractMailChannel(OpenMailConnection event, Channel channel) {
090            super(channel);
091            openEvent = event;
092            if (executorService == null) {
093                downPipeline = newEventPipeline();
094            } else {
095                downPipeline = newEventPipeline(executorService);
096            }
097        }
098
099        /**
100         * Returns the event that caused this connection to be opened.
101         * 
102         * @return the event
103         */
104        public Optional<OpenMailConnection> openEvent() {
105            return Optional.ofNullable(openEvent);
106        }
107
108        /**
109         * Gets the down pipeline.
110         *
111         * @return the downPipeline
112         */
113        public EventPipeline downPipeline() {
114            return downPipeline;
115        }
116
117    }
118}
